author: Maya Oppenheim, Maya Oppenheim
title: 'Hero' doctor becomes first working NHS surgeon to die from coronavirus in UK
description: 'This virus is unforgiving, indiscriminate, and it can be brutal. Adil's death had come out of the blue, his family are bereft, bewildered and struggling to come to terms with his passing,' says cousin
content:
An organ transplant consultant who volunteered on the frontline to conquer the coronavirus pandemic has become the first working NHS surgeon to die from the virus in the UK.
Adil El Tayar, who has been hailed a hero on social media, dedicated his life to car… [+4492 chars]
